hero.title: Hello, I'm a Creative Developer
hero.description: I craft beautiful digital experiences with clean code and thoughtful design. Specialized in modern web technologies and minimalist aesthetics.

bio.h1: Hello, I'm Ken, you can also call me Kakeru
bio.p1: I'm an independent developer who can't help but try out interesting things and enjoys researching new technologies. I graduated from the Department of Information Engineering with 1 year of development experience, covering both web development and AI.
bio.p2: For frontend development, I'm skilled in using React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Git, GitHub, Japanese, Project Management and other technologies to build websites.
bio.p3: For backend development, I'm skilled in using Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL and other technologies to build backend servers.
bio.p4: I recommend using Zeabur for website hosting, a startup brand from Taiwan.
